text.33_Chapter, 5_Verse, 1_Comment: וגבול, the word “western” is missing. Our sages explain the repetition of this word as small islands in the sea.
text.33_Chapter, 5_Verse, 0_Comment: וגבול ים, as if the Torah had written an introductory line: “how was the westerly boundary?” [clearly, it is difficult to justify these two words. Ed.]
